short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your Skool messages using our easy-to-use CRM to help with your conversations and leads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Teachers Aid helps you manage your inbox, follow up with prospects, get more sales & build your community.
Never lose a Lead, Message, or Sale On Skool again!


Mini Skool Messenger CRM that helps you:
✔️ Simplify your inbox
✔️ Follow up with leads
✔️ Close more sales
✔️ Build your community



🚀 Boost Your Sales with Automated Lead Tracking
Track every lead, set smart reminders, custom notes to ensure no opportunity is missed. Spend less time tracking and more time closing deals.


❤️ Why Teams Love Teacher’s Aid
Everything your team needs to track, organize, and convert leads—without getting overwhelmed by complex tools. No more communication gaps—everyone stays aligned and productive.


👋 Simple Setup—Get Started in Minutes
No complicated installations. Teacher’s Aid is easy to use from day one, so you can spend less time setting up and more time closing deals.


🏷️ Simplify your inbox with Tags & Reminders
Automatically sync tags, notes, and reminders with your team to keep your contacts organized so you never miss an opportunity.




How it works:
1. Open the extension
2. Assign or create a tag
3. Set any reminders or notes
4. And that’s it!


Teachers Aid is a Mini Skool Messenger CRM that helps communities grow and thrive.






Stay in touch:
Support: https://help.teachersaid.io
Feedback: https://feedback.teachersaid.io


Support:
Have any questions or feedback? Please get in touch with our support team at support@teachersaid.io

SAFETY & PRIVACY POLICY
Disclaimer: Teachers Aid is not affiliated with Skool in anyway. The extension doesn't read, collect or share any type of user information.
